/* Main.c file generated by New Project wizard
 *
 * Created:   Tue Dec 3 2024
 * Processor: LPC1113FBD48/301
 * Compiler:  GCC for ARM
 */

#include <LPC11xx.h>
#define GPIO0DIR (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50008000))
#define GPIO0DATA (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50003ffc))
#define GPIO1DIR (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50018000))
#define GPIO1DATA (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50013ffc))
#define GPIO2DIR (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50028000))
#define GPIO2DATA (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50023ffc))

int main (void)
 { 
   GPIO2DIR |= 0b1111111;
   GPIO0DIR |= 0b111100 ;
   GPIO1DIR |=0b1;
   GPIO1DATA &=0b0;      
   int seg_encoder [] = { 0xC0,0xF9,0xA4,0xB0,0x99,0x92,0x82,0xF8,0x80,0x90 }; // common anode
   //int seg_encoder [] = { 0x3f,0x06,0x5b,0x4f,0x66,0x6d,0x7d,0x07,0xff,0x6f }; common cathode
   int num = 555;
   int i ;
   GPIO2DATA = seg_encoder[num];
   while (1) {
      
      
   int hs = (num/100)%10;   //hundreds
   int ts = (num/10)%10;    //tens
   int os = (num)%10;       //ones
      
      GPIO0DATA = 0b001000;
      GPIO2DATA = seg_encoder[hs];
      for(i=0;i<5000;i++);
	 
      GPIO0DATA = 0b010000;
      GPIO2DATA = seg_encoder[ts];
      for(i=0;i<9000;i++);
	 
      GPIO0DATA = 0b100000;
      GPIO2DATA = seg_encoder[os];
      for(i=0;i<9000;i++);
            num--;

      }
   return 0;
 }  


Lab1 Nesma Ahmad Saeed Lubbad 220200467



//first example on off led

//#define GPIO0DATA (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50003FFC))

//setup phase
//GPIO0DIR |= 0b100;//0 input , 1 (pin2) output not change the prev. status
//int i = 0;
//while (1) {//infinite loop not execute anything but it
//looping phase
//GPIO0DATA ^= 0b100;//change the state 
//for(i=0;i<100000;i++);//wait 100000 seconds then change the status
//}
//}

//second example with button
//int main () {
//setup phase
//GPIO0DIR =0b100;
//while (1) {
//looping phase
//if (GPIO0DATA & 0b10) {
//GPIO0DATA ^=0b100;
//while(GPIO0DATA & 0b10);

//third example 3leds
//int main () {
//setup phase
//GPIO0DIR |= 0b11100;
//GPIO0DATA = 0b10100;//on off on first state
//while (1) {
//looping phase
//if (GPIO0DATA & 0b10) {
//GPIO0DATA ^= 0b11100; //toggle
//while ((GPIO0DATA & 0b10));
//}
//}
//}



#define GPIO0DIR (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50028000))
#define GPIO0DATA (*((volatile unsigned long *)0x50023FFC))

int main () {
//setup phase
   GPIO0DIR |= 0b11110;                        //leds as output
   GPIO0DATA = 0b00000;                       //initial state for leds
   while (1) {
//looping phase
      if (GPIO0DATA & 0b100000) {              //click first button
          GPIO0DATA = 0b11110;                 //shine all leds
         while ((GPIO0DATA & 0b100000));
      }
      if (GPIO0DATA & 0b1000000) {             //click second button
          GPIO0DATA = 0b00000;                 //turn off all leds
          while ((GPIO0DATA & 0b1000000));
      }
   }
   return 0;
}
